title: Deep discounts and cash backs during festive sales by e-commerce companies are killing small retailers: CAIT
description: Industry body Confederation of All India Traders (CAIT) has raised concerns on the deep discounts or cashbacks provided by the e-commerce festive sales by the companies, which tends to monopolise the retail market, hence reducing the abilities of the small offline retailers.
